attributes.title: Be Life Positive - Be "Ushaar Saami!"
attributes.description:
30th NOVEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS FROM TODAY’S NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANGH 

*NOW STARTS THE REAL CELEBRATION! TODAY I WILL TALK ABOUT THE BIOLOGY OF ESHWARA SHAKTI. ESHWARA SHAKTI IS NOT BRUTAL FORCE, IT IS INTELLIGENT FORCE. THE BIOLOGY ITSELF IS A LIVING ENERGY. BECAUSE THE BIOLOGY IS A LIVING ENERGY, THE FORCE BORN OUT OF IT IS NOT BRUTAL, IT IS INTELLIGENT ENERGY. IF THE FORCE IS GENERATED NOT FROM A LIVING MECHANISM, THAT FORCE WILL BE BRUTAL. BUT IF THE FORCE IS GENERATED FROM A LIVING MECHANISM, IT IS ALWAYS “FOR LIFE”. 

*WHAT I AM GOING TO SHARE TODAY, IF IT CAN BE TAKEN TO THE WORLD, WE CAN MAKE WORLD LIFE POSITIVE. I WILL TELL YOU WHAT REALLY WORKS IN LIFE! UNDERSTAND THIS ONE KEY - WHAT YOU CONSCIOUSLY VISUALISE, WORKS! IF YOU DON’T CONSCIOUSLY VISUALISE OR DECLARE, WHAT YOU ARE AFRAID OF WORKS! WHAT SCARES, FRIGHTENS, SENDS CHILLS DOWN YOUR SPINE. THAT BECOMES A REALITY IF YOU DON’T CONSCIOUSLY DECIDE AS DECLARED. 

*THE GOOD NEWS: ANY OF YOUR CONSCIOUS DECISIONS IS TOO POWERFUL THAN ANYTHING THAT SCARES, FRIGHTENS AND THREATENS YOU. EVEN ONE CONSCIOUS DECISION IN YOU CAN CLEAR AWAY MILLIONS OF UNCONSCIOUS FEARS AND SCARIEST THINGS IN YOUR SYSTEM. 

*THE VERY LIFESTYLE OF HINDUS IS BUILT ON CONSCIOUS DECISIONS, PLANNING AND LIVING “FOR LIFE”. IN HINDU TRADITION, THERE IS NO HIGHER OR LOWER GODS. ALL GODS ARE EMBODIMENT OF ONENESS. START LIVING ANY PRINCIPLE AND CONSCIOUSLY START MANIFESTING IT, YOU WILL BE SUCCESSFUL. 

*I WANT ALL OF YOU TO WATCH THIS SATSANG 3-4 TIMES. ALL THE STATEMENTS I AM MAKING, YOU NEED TO WATCH A FEW TIMES AND CONNECT TO THE DEEPER MEANINGS OF STATEMENTS. 

*YOUR STRATEGIES, POLICIES AND UNDERSTANDINGS ABOUT YOURSELF AND EVERYTHING IN LIFE, HOW YOU CALCULATE RIGHT OR WRONG, GOOD OR BAD, WHAT YOU PERCEIVE AS BLESSINGS OR CURSE, ALL THESE ARE ALREADY INFUSED WITH FOR-LIFE PRINCIPLES. I AM REQUESTING YOU TO LOOK IN MORE AND MORE AND ADD LIFE-POSITIVE PRINCIPLES. THE TRUST BETWEEN YOU AND LIFE IS ALREADY THERE. ADD MORE LIFE POSITIVE PRINCIPLES AND TAKE IT TO THE NEXT LEVEL. 

*IF YOU FEEL THERE IS LOW OR NO TRUST BETWEEN YOU AND ME, YOU SHOULD DO SOMETHING TO BUILD THAT TRUST, NOT THAT YOU WILL ABUSE THE GURU OR NEGOTIATE WITH THE GURU. 


*I INSIST THAT ALL MY DISCIPLES, DEVOTEES AND FOLLOWERS, BRING ABSOLUTE LOVE, KEEP ENRICHING AS STRATEGY TO HANDLE ALL CRISIS WHETHER IN THE SANGA, PERSONAL LIFE OR RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN YOU AND GURU. BRING EXTREME LOVE AND ENRICHING! 

*PEOPLE WERE SENDING ME MANY REPORTS THAT, “MANY HINDU GURUS ARE ABUSING YOU AND SPEAKING ABOUT YOU IN SINGULAR.” I ONLY WANT TO TELL, BRING DEEP LOVE AND ENRICHING INTO EVERY RELATIONSHIP. IF YOU CAN DO ANY HELP, GO TO THAT RELIGIOUS LEADER WITH A PLATE FULL OF FRUITS AND FLOWER, KEEP AT HIS FEET, FALL AT HIS FEET, EXPLAIN OUR STORY, PRESENT ALL THE FACTS AND TRUTHS, ENRICH THEM WITH WHAT WE ARE DOING, WHY WE ARE ATTACKED AND EDUCATE YOURSELF AND THEM. THEY MIGHT HAVE SPOKEN AGAINST ME BECAUSE THEY MIGHT NOT BE COMPLETELY INFORMED ABOUT THIS WHOLE THING. 
*DURING THESE KIND OF ATTACKS AND CRISIS - PATIENCE, LOVE, ENRICHING AND LIFE POSITIVITY, ALL THESE ARE NEEDED IN LARGE QUANTITY. THESE DEVOTEES ALSO TOLD, “LAST TIME, WHEN SOME HINDU GURU SPOKE AGAINST YOU, THE DEVOTEES FILED A CASE ON THAT PERSON.”  YOU NEED TO UNDERSTAND THAT WAS PARAMAHAMSA NITHYANANDA’S PERIOD. THIS IS NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM!

*PLEASE BE INFORMED, AFTER THE GREAT PAUSE, THE RESPONSIBILITIES OF NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVAM IS FAR MORE HIGHER THAN THE RESPONSIBILITIES OF PARAMAHAMSA NITHYANANDA. BECAUSE OF THAT, STRATEGIES,  REACTIONS, RESPONSE, EVERYTHING HAS TO BE BASED ON ABSOLUTE LOVE, NONVIOLENCE, EXPLANATION, ENRICHING, AND ABOVE ALL, PRINCIPLES OF ENLIGHTENMENT!
